sn35.102:1.2: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.102:1.6: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.102:1.9: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35.102:1.12: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.102:1.15: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati …pe…
sn35.102:1.16: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35.102:1.18: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.102:1.19: Yampi, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha.
sn35.102:1.20: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
